*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Samuel M. Williams, Mexico, November 28, 1833. Preparing to return to Texas. Reforms obtained. Political conditions.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
[From Williams Fapers, Rosenberg Library, Galveston, Tex,]
*p**location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="11-26-1833">Novr. 26 1833*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dr Sir.*/p*
*p*The law repealing the 11 article of the law of*date_mentioned n="04-06-1830"> 6 april 1830*/date_mentioned*, was passed by both houses, as I informed you in former letters, but, unfortunately it was not sent to the *person_mentioned*executive */person_mentioned*untill the day of *person_mentioned*Santana*/person_mentioned*s entrance into this city from *location_mentioned*Guanajuato*/location_mentioned*. *person_mentioned*Gomez Farias*/person_mentioned* went out that day and the *person_mentioned*hero */person_mentioned*went into the *location_mentioned*presidential chair*/location_mentioned*—he retained the law 9 days and returned it on the *date_mentioned n="11-10-1833">10th*/date_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*congress */person_mentioned* requesting that its operation should be suspended for six months. This was unanimously agreed to by *person_mentioned*both houses*/person_mentioned*, and the law was finally published on the *date_mentioned n="11-21-1833">21 instant*/date_mentioned* so that the repeal does not take effect untill the *date_mentioned n="05-21-1834">21st May next*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*I think it doubtfull whether my letters reach *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*, I will therefore merely say that I leave in about ten days for home by land— perhaps I shall go on with*person_mentioned* Genl Pedro Lemus*/person_mentioned* who is appointed *person_mentioned*Comnt Genl*/person_mentioned* in place of *person_mentioned*Felisola*/person_mentioned*. *person_mentioned*Mejia */person_mentioned*has the command in *person_mentioned*chief in the *location_mentioned*South*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* where the civil war [is] Still raging tho I think that *person_mentioned*Mejia */person_mentioned*will soon terminate it. he is in the direction of *location_mentioned*Acapulco*/location_mentioned*. and *person_mentioned*Genl Victoria*/person_mentioned* is in *location_mentioned*Oaxaca*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*matters are all right, nothing is wanted there but quiet. No troops go with *person_mentioned*Genl Lemus*/person_mentioned*—*person_mentioned*Santana */person_mentioned*hung up the State question and wished to have *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*made a *location_mentioned*territory*/location_mentioned*, and I believe that I have been the means of preventing it and that question is also hung up. This has made me a goodly number of *person_mentioned*enemies*/person_mentioned* here who wished for a *location_mentioned*Territory*/location_mentioned*—nada importa—nil will go right. Close up all pending matters. It is now very important to harmonise with *location_mentioned*Bexar*/location_mentioned*. Keep this in view. I shall be at *location_mentioned*home */location_mentioned*soon.*/p*
*p*[Stephen F. Austin.]*/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Don Samuel M Williams*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin Texas*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*/div1*
